channel.title: I have written stuff on Diptanuj Sarkar

item.title: Semester 4
item.content:encoded:
You can find all the notes (incomplete ones and lab notes included) uploaded here - link

End Semester Merged Notes

Only these are complete -

  • PH2201: Basic Quantum Mechanics

Mid Semester Merged Notes

I only have these notes complete, here they are -

  • PH2201: Basic Quantum Mechanics
  • PH2202: Thermal Physics
  • Adrika’s Notes for LS2202

Typed up notes

These will only be updated until I realise I should just stop and study Analysis instead (I need to pass).

  • PH2202: Thermal Physics
  • PH2201: Basic Quantum Mechanics

item.title: Semester 3
item.content:encoded:
Here are some of the lectures notes that I took in Semester 3.

  • PH2101: Waves and Oscillations (Credits to Adrika and Piyush for filling in the parts that I missed)
